member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_RATE_CONVERSION_CAPS
member.summary: Defines a group of video processor capabilities that are associated with frame-rate conversion, including deinterlacing and inverse telecine.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_RATE_CONVERSION_CAPS.PastFrames
member.summary: The number of past reference frames required to perform the optimal video processing.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_RATE_CONVERSION_CAPS.FutureFrames
member.summary: The number of future reference frames required to perform the optimal video processing.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_RATE_CONVERSION_CAPS.ProcessorCaps
member.summary: A bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_RATE_CONVERSION_CAPS.ITelecineCaps
member.summary: A bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_RATE_CONVERSION_CAPS.CustomRateCount
member.summary: The number of custom frame rates that the driver supports. To get the list of custom frame rates, call the method.
